title: The Social Gardener Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Organic, Western, Take-out, Canadian
description: This vegetarian cafe is an initiative of the Riverdale Immigrant Woman Enterprise (RIWE). Serves coffee drinks and a small menu of sandwiches, salads, and snacks plus a daily soup. Food changes seasonally. Produce is grown and harvested from the rooftop garden. Serves house baked goods as well as other bakery products. Hosts live music. Opened since early 2014.
